EmailTemplate.textOnly: Did you know online grocery purchases increased 54 percent in 2020? That’s a $30 billion increase. That’s a lot of zeros—and it’s only going up from there. Retailers without an online solution to accommodate the surge in spending habits are watching shoppers take their money elsewhere.
